title: Was it a $380 million deal to sell T.J.I. on Friday that was cancelled because of Coffid?
subtitle: The COVID-19 epidemic had a negative impact on restaurants all over the world, but the story of the TGI deal on Friday was unfortunately one of one kind.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: A $380 million deal was cancelled for the sale on Friday of TGI, which was announced on March 31, 2020, due to the upcoming COVID-19 epidemics.
